programme.title: Never Ends
programme.desc: (R) Award winning host Marco Liao packs a more fulfilling journey to the different corners of the world and learn about the heritage, culture, food and places of interests.

programme.title: Life's Perfectionists
programme.desc: (R)(Dual Language - Mandarin and Korean) This programme introduces individuals who are outstanding in their respective fields of work. Find out how the featured individuals rose to the top of their leagues based on hard work and enthusiasm.

programme.title: My Healing Love
programme.desc: (R)(Dual Language - Mandarin and Korean) Songzhu switched Zaixue's DNA sample with that of an orphan previously, causing the police to use the wrong sample to search for Zhiyou. Xiaoshi is dealt with a blow when the police inform the Cuis that Zhiyou has passed away from a traffic accident.

programme.title: Where Stars Land
programme.desc: (R)(Dual Language - Mandarin and Korean) While hurriedly seeking shelter from the pouring rain, Han Xiatian accidentally bumps into Li Xiuyan, and realizes that Xiuyan looks very familiar!

programme.title: Beautiful Love, Wonderful Life
programme.desc: (Dual Language - Mandarin and Korean) Qing-er goes through Youna's statements in the hit-and-run case. She arrives at the conclusion that the hit-and-run driver was Junqian and Youna has tried to cover up the truth. Youna is touted as the hot favourite for the position of Chief Justice of the Supreme Court.

programme.title: Beautiful Love, Wonderful Life
programme.desc: (Dual Language - Mandarin and Korean) Junyi finally gets to know that it was Hailang who bullied Qing-er in high school. He appears before the disciplinary committee to speak up for Qing-er. He also apologises to Qing-er on behalf of Hailang.

programme.title: Being Together - A Family Portrait
programme.desc: Ridzwan uprooted his family and left for Korea for a good job. The difference in language, culture and food posted a huge challenge to his family of 5 at first. After more than 2-year of stay-home measures battling with Covid and aged parents in Singapore waiting, he is reconsidering his choice. Dominic left for Korea to be with his then girlfriend. Things didn't work out but Dominic choose to stay. Why?

programme.title: Sinister Beings
programme.desc: Several large companies are attacked by hackers for ransom, and Zhang Xi finds that these hackers may be related to the Tiger killing case.

programme.title: News Tonight
programme.desc: A comprehensive half-hour news programme, NEWS TONIGHT provides viewers with important local, international and financial developments for the day.

programme.title: See You At The Market
programme.desc: (R) In this new series, host Li Ming Chong will be introducing shops and delicacies of rich culture and characteristics. He will also visiting shops which have been operating in the local area for many years such as declining Asian lead shops, iron shops, and traditional pawnshops.

programme.title: Super Taste Super Joy
programme.desc: (R) A studio-based variety show on quizzes about food and cooking, hosted by popular food hosts Zeng Guo Cheng and James (I-Walker).

programme.title: My Healing Love
programme.desc: (R)(Dual Language - Mandarin and Korean) Zhiyu makes Xiyue a dress that looks exactly like what she had worn as a child. Xiaoshi is shocked to see that dress. At the same time, Zaixue has a nagging suspicion that Zhiyu is Zhiyou, but Songzhu stops him from clarifying his doubts with Zhiyu.

programme.title: Where Stars Land
programme.desc: (R)(Dual Language - Mandarin and Korean) Xiatian is very upset that she has to be Xiuyan's apprentice, considering that he has only been on the job for just a month. She registers her unhappiness with Yang Shujun.

programme.title: Beautiful Love, Wonderful Life
programme.desc: (Dual Language - Mandarin and Korean) Hailang moves out of her house. Huaying offers to let Hailang stay in her house for the time being. Zhenyou leaves home when he learns that Hailang will be staying with them.

programme.title: Beautiful Love, Wonderful Life

programme.title: The Treasured Voice
programme.desc: (R) Each episode will have six groups of music partners to sing together in pairs. One of them will have the opportunity to cooperate with a veteran singer to perform a golden song. Music partners who have not been selected can also send invitations to other guests. If the guest accepts the invitation, it will have priority over the selected permanent partners to form a group. programme.title: 12 Summers
programme.desc: (R) An entertaining and colourful travelogue where 12 hosts who goes to 5 countries during summer to experience the life and different cultures there. Also the different things that the people do during summer. Countries include Fiki, Spain, Greece, Korea and South Africa. The hosts are Tiffany Lau, Owen Cheung, Karl Ding, Carlos Chan, Shiga Lin, Gloria Tang etc.

programme.title: RenovAID
programme.desc: (R) The 10th season of RenovAID sees a new presenter at the helm! Oon Shu An joins our interior designers, contractors and volunteers as they help underprivileged families renew, rebuild and revitalise their homes.

programme.title: Being Together - A Family Portrait
programme.desc: (R) Ridzwan uprooted his family and left for Korea for a good job. The difference in language, culture and food posted a huge challenge to his family of 5 at first. After more than 2-year of stay-home measures battling with Covid and aged parents in Singapore waiting, he is reconsidering his choice. Dominic left for Korea to be with his then girlfriend. Things didn't work out but Dominic choose to stay. Why?

programme.title: Marry Me Now
programme.desc: (R)(Dual Language - Mandarin and Korean) Meilian realised that Dongzhen knows of her sickness and could be plotting something against her. She meets with him and fakes her symptoms to find out exactly what he is scheming and threatens to take it to legal authorities.

programme.title: Marry Me Now
programme.desc: (R)(Dual Language - Mandarin and Korean) Wenzhi is shocked that Dongzhen is scheming to cheat Meilian's fortune and tries to stop his father from doing so but the latter gives him a deaf ear. Youhe is unhappy with Entai uses her as an excuse to reject going to Africa doing voluntary work.

programme.title: My Only One
programme.desc: (R)(Dual Language - Mandarin and Korean) Enying tells Grandma Pu that because of her sickness causes Dalu and Daolan to be together which she is against of their relationship. Grandma Pu feels guilty and secretly leaves for the nursing home. Xiuri happens to see her leaving and informs Chairman Wang about Grandma Pu.

programme.title: My Only One
programme.desc: (R)(Dual Language - Mandarin and Korean) Dalu realises Daolan leaves him because of his mother objects to their relationship. Dalu assures to Chairman Wang his love to Daolan. Chairman Wang finally agrees to their marriage.

programme.title: China's Got Talent
programme.desc: China's Got Talent is the talent show with no age limit, no talent restrictions and no cultural boundaries. Acts ranging from the sublime to the ridiculous, in fact, anyone doing anything are given the chance to win the hearts of a nation. At stake: a life-changing opportunity.Host: Zhang Chunhua.Judges: Deng Zhiqi, Meng Fei, Nicholas Tse and Annie Yi.

programme.title: Hole In The Wall
programme.desc: (R) They have swapped their well-pressed suits for kitchen aprons to become proud makers of the popular Teochew snack, Soon Kueh. Michelle Chia sets out to the unassuming nooks and corners of Singapore in search of these traditional goodies that are making their mark on the island's gastronomic map!

programme.title: Eternal
programme.desc: (Dual Language - Mandarin and Thai) Yuexia stops Juntai from saving Zhiwei after he finds out that Juntai is not his son. Zhaoyang is in the midst of saving Chenwu's life when Shengyuan informs him that Chenwu could be Langpeng's killer...

programme.title: Eternal
programme.desc: (Dual Language - Mandarin and Thai) Juntai plans to flee with Shuiling after Maolin and Chenwu are arrested. He learns that Shuiling has brought Borui to Zhaoyang. Meanwhile, Zhaoyang is shot by Diqin and falls into the river...

programme.title: News Tonight
programme.desc: A comprehensive half-hour news programme, NEWS TONIGHT provides viewers with important local, international and financial developments for the day.

programme.title: Dr Romantic
programme.desc: (R)(Dual Language - Mandarin and Korean) Encai is told that her involvement is not needed when she shows up at the operating theatre. She is shocked to see that Yuzhen is included in Minguo's operation instead. Encai is disappointed with Yuzhen as she assumes that Yuzhen has decided to join Minguo's camp for self-interest.
